headline: PG&E Sets Dates for Quarterly Stock Dividends
summary: On December 11, 2025, PG&E Corporation (NYSE: PCG) declared its fourth quarter 2025 regular cash dividend of $0.05 per share on the Corporation's common stock. The dividend is payable on January 15, 2026, to shareholders of record as of December 31, 2025.
